short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds you the fastest trains and best time to travel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improved DB UX:
1. Highlights travel time
2. Highlights late night trains
3. Highlights train disruption notifications
4. Automatically finds you the best tickets for the locations by going through all trains
